cards.name: Dominaria's Judgment
cards.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain protection from white if you control a Plains, from blue if you control an Island, from black if you control a Swamp, from red if you control a Mountain, and from green if you control a Forest.

"A good guard is alert. A great guard is also loyal."

cards.flavor: "Crovax knows we're coming now," said a grinning Sisay. "I just sent the Predator crashing into his stronghold."

cards.text:
Choose one -
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Destroy target artifact and target enchantment.

cards.name: Keldon Twilight
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's end step, if no creatures attacked this turn, that player sacrifices a creature of their choice that they controlled since the beginning of the turn.

cards.name: Lava Zombie
cards.text:
When this creature enters, return a black or red creature you control to its owner's hand.
{2}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Rule through fear, Darigaaz. Only if the dragons feel terror will they truly be your servants."
-Tevesh Szat
cards.name: Malicious Advice
cards.text: Tap X target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands. You lose X life.

cards.name: Marsh Crocodile
cards.text:
When this creature enters, return a blue or black creature you control to its owner's hand.
When this creature enters, each player discards a card.

cards.flavor: Meddling mages chant so loudly that no one can get a spell in edgewise.
cards.name: Meddling Mage
cards.text:
As this creature enters, choose a nonland card name.
Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.

cards.name: Natural Emergence
cards.text:
When this enchantment enters, return a red or green enchantment you control to its owner's hand.
Lands you control are 2/2 creatures with first strike. They're still lands.

cards.flavor:
"He is Yawgmoth's reward to me. I shall kill him a hundred times a day."
-Crovax, to Ertai

cards.name: Phyrexian Tyranny
cards.text: Whenever a player draws a card, that player loses 2 life unless they pay {2}.

cards.name: Questing Phelddagrif
cards.text:
{G}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Target opponent creates a 1/1 green Hippo creature token.
{W}: This creature gains protection from black and from red until end of turn. Target opponent gains 2 life.
{U}: This creature gains flying until end of turn. Target opponent may draw a card.

cards.flavor: When angered or frightened, it protects itself with a burst of blinding light.

When this creature enters, return a black or red creature you control to its owner's hand.
When this creature enters, each player sacrifices a land of their choice.

Flying

cards.flavor: Like his mother before him, Darigaaz gave his life defending Dominaria from the tyranny of self-styled "gods."
cards.name: Terminate
cards.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

Choose one -
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target attacking creature.

cards.flavor: Deep in Yawgmoth's realm, Urza stopped dead in his tracks and rubbed his soot-filled eyes. "Mishra?"
cards.name: Urza's Guilt
cards.text: Each player draws two cards, then discards three cards, then loses 4 life.

cards.flavor: Overflowing with visions of the possible future, it lends power to those in the present.
